folder.name: 11. ASM
folder.tooltip: ASM - List ASM Disks and Disk Groups

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --set line 200 pages 100 --column DATABASE_COMPATIBILITY form a25 --column COMPATIBILITY form a15 select GROUP_NUMBER , NAME , CASE WHEN TOTAL_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TOTAL_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TOTAL_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END TOTAL , CASE WHEN FREE_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FREE_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FREE_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE --, TO_CHAR(ROUND((TOTAL_MB - FREE_MB)/TOTAL_MB*100,2),'FM900.00') PCT_USED , TO_CHAR(ROUND((TOTAL_MB - FREE_MB)/decode(TOTAL_MB,0,1)*100,2),'FM900.00') PCT_USED , CASE WHEN COLD_USED_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(COLD_USED_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM900.00') || ' TB' WHEN COLD_USED_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(COLD_USED_MB/1024,2),'FM900.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(COLD_USED_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END COLD_USED , CASE WHEN HOT_USED_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(HOT_USED_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN HOT_USED_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(HOT_USED_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(HOT_USED_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END HOT_USED , STATE , TYPE , COMPATIBILITY , DATABASE_COMPATIBILITY , VOTING_FILES from v$asm_diskgroup order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select :NAME DISK_GROUP , GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER , PATH , CASE WHEN OS_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OS_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN OS_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OS_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(OS_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "SIZE" , CASE WHEN TOTAL_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TOTAL_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TOTAL_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END TOTAL , CASE WHEN FREE_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FREE_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FREE_MB,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , MOUNT_STATUS , HEADER_STATUS , MODE_STATUS , STATE , CREATE_DATE , MOUNT_DATE , REDUNDANCY , UDID , READS , WRITES from v$asm_disk where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by DISK_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , INSTANCE_NAME , DB_NAME --, CLUSTER_NAME , STATUS , SOFTWARE_VERSION , COMPATIBLE_VERSION from v$asm_client where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , INSTANCE_NAME , DB_NAME , CLUSTER_NAME , STATUS , SOFTWARE_VERSION , COMPATIBLE_VERSION from v$asm_client where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , INSTANCE_NAME , DB_NAME , CLUSTER_NAME , STATUS , SOFTWARE_VERSION , COMPATIBLE_VERSION from v$asm_client where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , FILE_NUMBER , COMPOUND_INDEX , INCARNATION , BLOCK_SIZE , BLOCKS , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES --, SPACE , CASE WHEN SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SPACE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(SPACE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END SPACE , TYPE , REDUNDANCY , STRIPED , CREATION_DATE , MODIFICATION_DATE , REDUNDANCY_LOWERED , PERMISSIONS , USER_NUMBER , USER_INCARNATION , USERGROUP_NUMBER , USERGROUP_INCARNATION , PRIMARY_REGION , MIRROR_REGION , HOT_READS , HOT_WRITES , HOT_BYTES_READ , HOT_BYTES_WRITTEN , COLD_READS , COLD_WRITES , COLD_BYTES_READ , COLD_BYTES_WRITTEN --, CON_ID from v$asm_file where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER , FILE_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , ENTRY_NUMBER , REDUNDANCY , STRIPE , SYSTEM , NAME , PRIMARY_REGION , MIRROR_REGION --, CON_ID from v$asm_template where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , NAME , FILE_NUMBER , FILE_INCARNATION , ALIAS_INDEX , ALIAS_INCARNATION , PARENT_INDEX , REFERENCE_INDEX , ALIAS_DIRECTORY , SYSTEM_CREATED --, CON_ID from v$asm_alias where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , OPERATION --, PASS , STATE , POWER , ACTUAL , SOFAR , EST_WORK , EST_RATE , EST_MINUTES , ERROR_CODE --, CON_ID from v$asm_operation where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER , NAME , SECTOR_SIZE , BLOCK_SIZE , ALLOCATION_UNIT_SIZE , STATE , TYPE , TOTAL_MB , FREE_MB , HOT_USED_MB , COLD_USED_MB , REQUIRED_MIRROR_FREE_MB , USABLE_FILE_MB , OFFLINE_DISKS , COMPATIBILITY , DATABASE_COMPATIBILITY , VOTING_FILES from gv$asm_diskgroup_stat where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER , COMPOUND_INDEX , INCARNATION , MOUNT_STATUS , HEADER_STATUS , MODE_STATUS , STATE , REDUNDANCY , LIBRARY , OS_MB , TOTAL_MB , FREE_MB , HOT_USED_MB , COLD_USED_MB , NAME , FAILGROUP , LABEL , PATH , UDID , PRODUCT , CREATE_DATE , MOUNT_DATE , REPAIR_TIMER , READS , WRITES , READ_ERRS , WRITE_ERRS , READ_TIME , WRITE_TIME , BYTES_READ , BYTES_WRITTEN , PREFERRED_READ , HASH_VALUE , HOT_READS , HOT_WRITES , HOT_BYTES_READ , HOT_BYTES_WRITTEN , COLD_READS , COLD_WRITES , COLD_BYTES_READ , COLD_BYTES_WRITTEN , VOTING_FILE , SECTOR_SIZE , FAILGROUP_TYPE from gv$asm_disk_stat where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER

docproperty.title: ASM Disk Stats by Disk Groups
docproperty.author: Anand Mahajani

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , INSTNAME , DBNAME , GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER , FAILGROUP , READS , WRITES , READ_ERRS , WRITE_ERRS , READ_TIME , WRITE_TIME , BYTES_READ , BYTES_WRITTEN , HOT_READS , HOT_WRITES , HOT_BYTES_READ , HOT_BYTES_WRITTEN , COLD_READS , COLD_WRITES , COLD_BYTES_READ , COLD_BYTES_WRITTEN from gv$asm_disk_iostat where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by INST_ID , INSTNAME , DBNAME , GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER

docproperty.title: ASM Disk IO Stats by Disk Groups
docproperty.author: Anand Mahajani

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER , NAME , VALUE , ATTRIBUTE_INDEX , ATTRIBUTE_INCARNATION , READ_ONLY , SYSTEM_CREATED from gv$asm_attribute where GROUP_NUMBER = :GROUP_NUMBER order by INST_ID , GROUP_NUMBER , NAME , VALUE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select PATH , round(OS_MB/1024,2) DISK_SIZE_GB , HEADER_STATUS , 'ALTER DISKGROUP '||:NAME||' ADD DISK '||''''||PATH||''''||' SIZE '||OS_MB||' M REBALANCE POWER 5 WAIT;' "ADD DISK" from v$asm_disk where HEADER_STATUS <> 'MEMBER' order by DISK_NUMBER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GROUP_NUMBER , DISK_NUMBER , PATH , MOUNT_STATUS , HEADER_STATUS , MODE_STATUS , STATE , REDUNDANCY , CASE WHEN TOTAL_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TOTAL_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TOTAL_MB/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TOTAL_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END TOTAL , CASE WHEN FREE_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FREE_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FREE_MB/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FREE_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN OS_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OS_MB/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN OS_MB >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OS_MB/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(OS_MB,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "SIZE" , UDID , CREATE_DATE , MOUNT_DATE , READS , WRITES from v$asm_disk where HEADER_STATUS <> 'MEMBER' order by DISK_NUMBER
